thread.title: REFILE-BRIEF-Livzon Pharmaceutical'ss Board Agrees Unit To Invest $30 Mln In Global Health Science Fund II

author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Livzon Pharmaceutical'ss Board Agrees Unit To Invest $30 Mln In Global Health Science Fund II
text:
(Refiles with correct link)
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Livzon Pharmaceutical Group Inc :
* SAYS BOARD AGREES UNIT TO INVEST $30 MILLION IN GLOBAL HEALTH SCIENCE FUND II, L.P. Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CVb0qK Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
